Articles.Content: I\'m curious about how wide spread the use of plugins is, so here is a little poll.

It should be noted that, when talking about plugins, Mumech (the plugin included with MechJeb) also powers Damned Robotics, the Fixed Camera, the Muon detector, and probably a few other plugin-based parts I can\'t think of at the moment.

Missing Fixed Camera*, BACE, and Ludo (blimp).

*(technically a part of mechjeb, but I vote against mechjeb as I do not use the autopilot and dislike the challenge removal it represents)

I didn\'t know BACE had gone the plugin route, but by the looks of it it does not add new functionality (landing legs and solar panels).

Anyway, that\'s what 'other' is for.
I used to be an addon whore until version .14, then I started using stock, then gradually letting in mechjeb, then the cart addon, then finally the fixed camera addon.
